name: Smartphone
description: Cutting-edge performance with a sleek design. This smartphone combines a powerful processor, an exceptional camera, and long-lasting battery life to keep you connected and productive all day. Whether you're streaming, gaming, or capturing memories, it's your ultimate tech companion.

name: Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in high-quality sound with these wireless headphones. Featuring noise cancellation, crystal-clear audio, and a comfortable fit, they are perfect for music, calls, and gaming. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life for all-day entertainment.

name: Smart TV
description: Experience stunning 4K resolution and seamless streaming with this smart TV. Designed for modern living rooms, it features an intuitive interface, voice control, and a range of apps to transform your entertainment experience.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Take your gaming experience to the next level with this high-performance laptop. Equipped with the latest graphics card, lightning-fast SSD, and a vibrant display, it delivers smooth gameplay and stunning visuals. Ideal for gamers and creators alike.
